rows.label: qst102204_msg0001
rows.name: Hey! Thanks so much for your help!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0002
rows.name:
Kathira told me all
about your exploits.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0003
rows.name:
I hear you're traveling
with a very rare Blade.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0004
rows.name:
I had a comrade who was a Driver
a long time ago... He was an
incredibly reliable fellow.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, sorry! About the mission, please
ask the Squad Chief, Corden-san.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0101
rows.name:
Hey there! You made short work
of those monsters, I see.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0102
rows.name:
I have a new mission...
preparing a meal. I'm swamped.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0103
rows.name:
This is a pretty tough
task for a first mission.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0201
rows.name:
I heard! You're going
to help me, right?

rows.label: qst102204_msg0202
rows.name:
Cooking duty on my first
mission, and I have to find
the ingredients myself...

rows.label: qst102204_msg0203
rows.name:
The Hr√¶svelgr Mercenary Corps is
a tough place, that's for sure.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0204
rows.name:
In that case, could you gather
some ingredients for me?

rows.label: qst102204_msg0205
rows.name:
I'm confident in my cooking, but
I don't know this area well enough
to find the ingredients.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0206
rows.name:
Besides, with you guys around, I
get the feeling you could handle
anything that might happen...

rows.label: qst102204_msg0207
rows.name:
Sorry... It's just that I had a
bitter experience a long time ago.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0208
rows.name: Thanks for your concern. I'm fine.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0209
rows.name:
What I need you to gather are seven
Shade Trout and one Spoil-Apple.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0210
rows.name:
Corden-san or Kathira should know
where you can find them easily.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0211
rows.name: Well then, I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0301
rows.name:
I've asked for seven Shade
Trout and one Spoil-Apple.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0302
rows.name:
Corden-san or Kathira should know
where you can find them easily.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0303
rows.name: Be careful out there!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0401
rows.name:
Please ask Corden-san
about the next mission.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0402
rows.name:
After that's done, I want you to
tell me your stories about fighting
alongside Vandham-san, I promise!
